<title level="1" right="Rules">[Precious Material Shields](/Rules.aspx?ID=3175)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 233 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Shields made of precious materials are more expensive and have different durabilities. You can make [bucklers](/Shields.aspx?ID=17) and most shields out of any of these precious materials, but only [duskwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2918) can be used to make [tower shields](/Shields.aspx?ID=20).

[Click here for the Precious Material Shields category page](/Equipment.aspx?Category=28&Subcategory=29).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
